name: Fill It Technologies
description: Fill It will provide the best workers the best jobs available on the day.

team.name: Clayton Francis
team.bioHtml: Founder @Fill It Technologies

jobs.title: Full Stack Developer
jobs.description:
Seeking a Full-Stack Developer passionate about all things tech, who is looking for more than just a job, and may have previously flirted with the idea of making a positive impact in the world.

As a startup, Fill It is a recruitment app, but this is where the journey begins, Fill It Technologies will be so much more.

No roles or duties to list, I'm looking for people to pioneer Fill It. If you must to be told what to do and how then this role isn't for you. But if you have a proactive attitude, think outside the box, and lead by example I'd love to hear from you!

ESSENTIAL:
A drive for personal development
Confidence in your ability
A passion for all things tech (obsession is also acceptable) ;)

Follow these steps to apply:

Check out the website, Social Media pages, and explainer videos. 
Consider what it will take to drive Fill It to the next level and beyond.
Then ask yourself if you are up for the challenge.

If the answer is yes, DON'T send your C.V., email me with a short introduction to arrange a quick chat. A C.V. tells me what you've done, but I want to discuss what we can do together.
